dict.acceptation: （he的所有格）他的；（he的物主代词）他的东西；
属于他的，用于名词前；自己的；指某人的；上帝的；

sent.orig: Joe was no richer than his friend.
sent.trans: 乔并不比他的朋友富。[乔和他的朋友一样穷。]（比较：Joe was not richer than his friend。乔比不上他的朋友富。）

sent.orig: The position of the pronoun "his" shows that it is to be betoned.
sent.trans: 代词“his”在句中的位置表示此词应加强调。

sent.orig: A good teacher should be able to infect his students with his own keenness for his subject.
sent.trans: 一个好教师应能以自己对本学科的热爱来影响学生。

sent.orig: A multimillionaire media magnate has shocked his employees with his candor by telling them all that he's putting his business affairs on hold to enter an alcoholism-counseling program.
sent.trans: 一位身份数百万的媒体大亨，坦诚地告诉他全体员工他将暂时搁置他的事业以便参加戒酒班，令员工大为惊愕。

sent.orig: After his death his property was shared between his children.
sent.trans: 他死后，财产由孩子们平分。
